name: Gusto! Sesame Soy Bowl All Green No Sauce
description: Dive into the refreshing world of healthy eating with our Gusto! Sesame Soy Bowl All Green No Sauce. A perfect blend of high-fiber ingredients like green leaf lettuce, miso glazed sweet potatoes, raw carrots, cucumber, and wakame seaweed, topped with lemon butter shrimp and black sesame seeds. This bowl is not only a feast for the eyes but also a nutrient powerhouse designed for those who enjoy 'Healthyfied' and health-conscious recipes. Despite its high sodium content, this recipe remains a guilt-free pleasure that satisfies the craving for something savory and nutritious.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the lettuce, carrots, and cucumber under cold water. Pat them dry with a paper towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the miso glazed sweet potatoes as per the instructions or until they are tender. Set them aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Hydrate the raw wakame seaweed in water for about 15 minutes, then drain and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the lemon butter shrimp in a pan over medium heat for 5 minutes or until they are pink and cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble the bowl by placing the green leaf lettuce at the bottom. Add the cooked sweet potatoes, raw carrots, cucumber, hydrated wakame, and cooked shrimp.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the black sesame seeds over the top of the bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
